product.longDescription: High yielding, good standing, six-rowed barley. Adapted for pearling, malting, and feed-grade barley. Sow at 85 lb./acre or 2 lb./1,000 sq. ft. Plant in spring or summer. For grain production, sow seeds in spring. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 12,900 seeds/lb.

High yielding, good standing, six-rowed barley. Adapted for pearling, malting, and feed-grade barley. Sow at 85 lb./acre or 2 lb./1,000 sq. ft. Plant in spring or summer. For grain production, sow seeds in spring. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 12,900 seeds/lb.
